name: Insidiousouls
description:
Insidiousouls is a souls-like game that you control a Demon Master as a main character. He steals the souls of demons and imprison them inside a sphere to use their powers.

This game developed for the graduation bootcamp of
Google Game and Application Academy in 2022, Turkey.

PROJECT ROLES & CREDITS

  • Serkan Yıldırım | Product Owner, Art Direction, Game Design, Story, Development
  • Ayşenur Yılmaz | Scrum Master, Development
  • Meriç Kayaçağlayan | Lead Developer, Technical Direction, Game Design, Dialogue
  • Şerife Sivritepe | Team Member, Developer 
  • Yasin Küllük | Team Member, Developer

STORY 

The Lands of Evil: The cruel, vindictive and insidious lands where the lives of many warriors and wizards came to an end. Some came here to test themselves, others for the Keeper's Eggs, the key to immense wealth. Most of them ended up feeding the Keeper with their souls, adding to her strength before they managed to get a single golden egg. The more daring set out on the way to the Cursed Land, and those who dared to step ahead were aware that the demons they would encounter were powerful enough to inflict endless suffering on them. This power was a veil that covered the eyes of those who wanted to dominate it. Many eyes blinded by his veil came here to make a deal with the Satan himself, and none of them were heard from. Only one person knew what really happened here: You can't make a deal with the devil! The only way to gain more power was to steal his soul. And that person set off... Who known as the Demon Master!

CONTROLS

  • ESC - Menu (A - D to change pages)
  • W A S D - Movement
  • Space - Dash, Evade
  • Left M. Button - Demon Slash
  • Hold LMB - Judgement Slash (Charge Until Bar is Full)
  • Right M. Button - Arrow (You must kill the first boss for this skill)
  • Q - Health Potion
  • 1 - Skill: Power Up Demon Slash
  • 2 - Skill: Arrow Rain (You must kill the first boss for this skill)

INSPIRED BY
Souls Games, FromSoftware | Devil May Cry Games, Capcom | Eldest Souls, Fallen Flag Stuido. The game title inspired by the game Dark Souls and the movie Insidious.

NOTEThis game only supports 1920x1080 screen resolution for now. We will release an update soon for resolution support and more!
